Accessible HTML

<div
  class="modal"
  role="dialog"
  aria-modal="true"
  aria-hidden="true"
  inert
  aria-labelledby="modal-title"
>
  <h2 id="modal-title">Title of the Modal</h2>
  <!-- Modal Contents -->
</div>

Semantics: the element is a modal dialog

  • role="modal"

  • aria-modal="true"

  • AT = Assitive Tech

  • Future Feature: <dialog> element (+ polyfill)

Visibility: the modal is open

Open Closed
aria-hidden="true"
inert

Label: the element has a title

  • aria-labelledby="{id of title}"
  • Read aloud by screen readers

Visibility: buttons

.text {
  font-family: Normal Font, sans-serif;
}

@supports (font-variation-settings) {
  .text {
    font-family: Variable Font, sans-serif;
  }
}

Italic, Light Italic, Bold Italic

Variable, Separate Italic 2 requests
